== About Me ==
   <nowiki>[[File:testina-1.png]]</nowiki>
 I live in Turin (Italy) and i have been using linux for several years, but i have never studied, all i know is only the result of my experience. <<BR>>

 I have been on the Ubuntu-it IRC channels since 2009, '''particularly the support channel''', and since 2018 I have been part of the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu-it.org/GruppoIrc|Italian IRC group]]</nowiki>. <<BR>>

 I occasionally collaborate with some opensource projects, in 2021 i added "italian language files" to <nowiki>[[https://github.com/eggheads/eggdrop|eggdrop]]</nowiki>. <<BR>>
